name: decompression
content:
decompression noun [U]
(PRESSURE)
Add to word list
Add to word list
a reduction in pressure around someone or something: Decompression due to altitude has physiological effects.
medical
  specialized removing harmful pressure on part of the body: cardiac/cerebral decompression

decompression noun [U]
(DATA)
computing
  specialized the process of returning or allowing something to return to its original size: data decompression

decompression noun [U]
(RELAXATION)
mainly US informal the process of relaxing: Last weekend we were all in need of a little decompression.
